name: End Apprenticeship
desc: Purchase freedom from your apprenticeship. You will become an independent practitioner of magic.

name: Slay Master
desc: Murder your master in their sleep.
flavor: Save heaps of money with the power of evil.

log.name: Master Slain
log.desc: Your master was a fool. A quick murder in the dark put an end to their petty demands, and frees you to pursue your own grander designs.

name: flying carpet
flavor: A whole new world.

desc: Perform tasks of different types simultaneously.
A mount that doesn't require much training.

name: old nag
desc: This horse has seen better days.

name: demure gelding
desc: A calm and sturdy horse, for moderate journeys.

name: fine bay
desc: A fine horse in its prime.

name: skeletal charger
desc: It neither breathes nor tires.

name: fire charger
desc: Hooves of flame leave lines of fire in the ground.
Fly on the winds.

name: chariot of fire
flavor: Bring me my chariot of fire.

name: pegasus
desc: A winged horse.

name: gryffon
desc: As fleet as it is fearsome.

name: travel tent
desc: Allows you to stay in the wilds longer.

name: travel map
desc: A map of the surrounding localities.

name: travel pack
desc: A pack to facilitate longer travels.
flavor: Someone needs to have a talk with the Sack Maker's guild.

name: tenwick's travel map
desc: Though neither a mage, nor a warrior, few braved the wilds of inner-Dhrune so completely as Tenwick.

name: casgair's conjured canopy
desc: Conjure a large tent for long journeys.

name: wax candle
desc: A tiny glowing candle.
flavor: You no take candle!

name: mortar and Pestle
desc: Useful for grinding herbs & fine ingredients.
Keep your money safe.
flavor: Seems a tad pricey for a bag.

name: velvet bag
desc: Small bag keeps gems safe without scratching.
flavor: Who prices these bags?!

name: gem box
desc: Finely crafted box for storing magic gems.

name: herb pouch
desc: Bag for holding herbs.
flavor: It holds herbs.

name: rune pouch
desc: Pouch for holding runes.

name: arcane orb
desc: Stores magical energy.

name: unseen scribe
desc: The quill lifts off the desk and begins to write...
flavor: Magic will do our magic for us now.

name: ghost compiler
desc: An invisible spirit binds your scrolls into codices.
flavor: Spirits never sleep.

name: ghost chains
desc: Hold more spirits in your sway.

name: morbid trinkets
desc: You have an unhealthy preoccupation with the macabre

name: unholy specimens
desc: Your somber collection grows.

name: bone collector
desc: Create a gibbering ghoul to scavenge for bones.
flavor: Don't ask where it finds them.

name: wood pipe
desc: Finely carved wooden pipe. Ruminate while peering into the sunset or a fire.
Focus of temporal synchronicity.

name: celestial globe
desc: A globe of the stars and constellations.

name: armillary sphere
desc: A small mechanical model of the known worlds.
The handbook of witches

name: loremaster's triumph
desc: A comprehensive work on Dhrune's history and achievements, large enough to fill a library.

name: four leaf clover
desc: A small but helpful charm.

name: Restless Nights
desc: Continue working even while idle.
flavor: A good apprentice knows there are 30 hours to the day.

name: Aided Thoughts
desc: As you support your thinking with Arcana, sleep becomes less of a necessity. You can use your time in a more efficient manner now
flavor: Arcana does nothing for the strain on your muscles, making this method useless for the average worker

name: speak to Birds
desc: Learn the secret languages of birds.

name: dragon Tongue
desc: Learn the ancient language of dragons.
Common way to carry coins.

name: better siphon
desc: allows you to extract life from corpses more efficiently

name: improved vats
desc: make your vats more efficient
Learn to perform life-force transfusions

name: energy Transfusion
desc: Transfusions now draw magical energy from bodies.

flavor: Nothing up my sleeves...

name: card deck
desc: A simple deck of cards.

name: three-sided coin
desc: You create your own luck.

name: membranous pouch
desc: A sack woven from living tissue helps preserve the gems.

name: deep incisions
desc: The safest place to store your precious gems is by your heart.

name: bag of holding
desc: You'll make your own bags, thank you.
flavor: The research costs a little more than you expected...

name: deep Pockets
desc: Cheaper than buying pouches.
flavor: There's another coin down here somewhere...

name: two-way portal
desc: Return to dungeons below your level after making a hasty exit.

name: sustained imbuement
desc: Unlocks an ability to imbue gems as a continuous action. Activate via furniture.

name: advanced imbuement chambers
desc: Improve the speed of your gem enchanting.

name: earth adaptation
desc: Resistance to earth-based attacks and afflictions.

name: poison adaptation
desc: A natural resistance to most poisons.

name: air adaptation
desc: Resistance to air-based assaults and enfeeblements.

name: water adaptation
desc: Resistance to water-based barrages and detriments.

name: fire adaptation
desc: Resistance to fire-based blasts and immolations.

name: nature adaptation
desc: Resistance to nature-based thorns and toxins.

name: spirit adaptation
desc: Resistance to spirit-based hexes and haunts.

name: light adaptation
desc: Resistance to light-based rays and dazzles.

name: shadow adaptation
desc: Resistance to shadow-based curses and ruins.

name: fire sign
desc: Born under the celestial sign of fire.

name: water sign
desc: Born under the celestial sign of water.

name: earth sign
desc: Born under the celestial sign of earth.

name: wind sign
desc: Born under the celestial sign of wind.

name: nature sign
desc: Born under the celestial sign of nature.

name: spirit sign
desc: Born under the celestial sign of spirit.

name: light sign
desc: Born under the celestial sign of light.

name: dark sign
desc: Born under the celestial sign of darkness.

name: poison veins
desc: You do not fear poison.

name: coin tricks
desc: Manipulate coins to produce more coins.
flavor: Didn't even palm it.

name: guiding star
desc: A light in the heavens guides your way.
flavor: Mornië Alantië.

desc: Carry more scrolls.
A wizard's power is the sum of their knowledge.

name: alkahest
desc: Discover a Universal Solvent.
flavor: Anything can be a liquid.

desc: A small crystal for performing optical experiments.

name: windchime
desc: Focus of air magic.

name: dream catcher
desc: You may not like what you catch.

name: heart Candle
desc: A warm glowing candle.
flavor: Spare a little candle, save some light for me.

name: holy candle
desc: White glowing candle.
flavor: It is better to light one candle than to curse the darkness.

name: somber candle
desc: Its faint light stirs the restless spirits.

name: unholy candle
desc: What flames cast shadows?
flavor: Darkness, Darkness.

desc: Receptacle for dust
Glassware for keeping herbs or powders.
flavor: Fine set of glassware with matching lids.

name: crystal ball
desc: A crystal sphere revealing distant lands.
A weighty tome of knowledge.

name: third eye
desc: See without seeing.
Wheels upon wheels; you turn them all.
Specialize in a school of magic.

name: crystal mind
desc: Expend your research to enhance your mental fortitude.

name: occult endurance
desc: Expend your research to discover new sources of stamina.

name: arcane body
desc: Expend your research to enhance your durability.

name: greater arcane body
desc: Magic over matter.
flavor: Magic over matter.

name: inner light
desc: A light in the darkness.
All these things have I expected, and more...
Immunity to mortal deceptions.
The guiding hand of fate.
flavor: Gods do not play dice...

desc: Ancient spellcasters often move with preternatural speed.

name: infused body
desc: Increases the effectiveness of arcane body.
Improve the efficacy of your scrolls by meticulous attention to penmanship.

name: magic skull
desc: An ordinary human skull, infused with necromantic magicks.
flavor: I knew him well

name: model skeleton
desc: Bones and string making a complex skeleton of a human.
flavor: If only they had a body.

name: model body
desc: Muscles, sinew and all the red and white bits needed to show how a body looks under the surface.

name: taxidermy animals
desc: Small animals stuffed, embalmed and ready for study or display.

name: touching the void
desc: Beyond the sphere of the planes lies a great void. Of its powers and dangers, the books are silent.

name: dedicated goal
desc: The first step of becoming a wizard is finding the motivation.
extdesc: Mark an activity as a goal to perform it as much as possible.

name: maniacal goals
desc: Monomaniacal pursuits are characteristic of all independent wizards.
extdesc: Mark an additional activity as a goal

name: idle pursuits
desc: Any good wizard knows that the best rest is a change of occupation.
extdesc: Mark an activity as a pursuit, to perform while idle.

name: expanded interests
desc: Expand your idle interests to an additional area.
extdesc: Mark an additional activity as a pursuit

name: never-idle
desc: You do not remember the last time you had a truly idle moment.
extdesc: Mark yet another activity as a pursuit

desc: A wizard's dreams are full as waking hours.
flavor: Every second of the night I live another life.

name: demonic pact
desc: A deal with a demon, sealed in blood. The knowledge offered is worth twice the price.
flavor: And they say the blood has to be yours.

name: siver's gate
desc: Siver knew true power comes only at great cost.
flavor: To stand before it would kill most men. to step beyond...

name: Plane of Spirits
desc: You sense countless sprits beyond the gate.
flavor: They seem to be in good spirits

name: Plane of Shadows
desc: Constant screaming, wailing and torture sounds can be heard as you approach the gate.
flavor: So this is where everybody gets sent to.

name: Plane of Demons
desc: Irith. Gellmud. Vornith. They offer you knowledge beyond your imagination.
flavor: All they ask for, is a single step.

name: Plane of Death
desc: You feel the connection to the plane of Death beyond the gate.
flavor: And you can't be killed like most men.

name: lesser hydrokinesis
desc: Learn how to gently nudge water with your will alone. Little more than a party trick for most, it is a great tool for cleaning the mountains of dishes your master's experiments leave behind.
flavor: Nobody ever enchanted a tool to do this on its own. Because everybody that could do so or afford it has more convenient options, like an apprentice or servants.

name: bottomless pitcher
desc: Unlimited source of water.
flavor: All you can drink.

name: evanescence
desc: Like you don't exist at all.
flavor: The nothing you've become.

name: typhoon
desc: The whirling chaos above the sea.
flavor: Become one with the wind and water.

name: autonomic mending
desc: Train your body to heal on its own.
flavor: I've had worse.

desc: Strong walls around your home, to deter unwise attackers.
flavor: Doubles as a burial mound.

name: core tap
desc: Tap the world's core for endless heat.

name: tamed pathway
desc: Train the roads around your home to behave.
flavor: Those good boys are perfect for keeping unwanted guests away.

name: hidden chamber
desc: A place to meditate in solitude, deep beneath the earth.

name: expansive lungs
desc: All the air you require.

name: water breathing
desc: Water is as air to you.

name: minerals collection
desc: Sorted by hardness.
flavor: A fantastic way to test your strength.

name: raise mountain
desc: Leave your mark on this world.

name: magic quarry
desc: A rocky escarpment to conduct your excavations more efficiently.

name: mythic anvil
desc: Made of mythical metals, this anvil can withstand even a titan's power.

name: subterranean pathways
desc: A twisting maze of indistinguishable passages spanning your domain.

name: inner fire
desc: Your body is a source of fire.
flavor: Ashes to ashes.

name: earth soul
desc: Your body is tuned to the earth.

name: heart of stone
desc: Ruthless as the barren earth.

name: swirling globe
desc: An unending supply of air.
flavor: Out of nothing at all.

name: ceaseless bellows
desc: These bellows run on their own.
Sacrifice luxury for higher attainments.

name: inner sanctum
desc: The halls of the mind are without limits.
Essential instrument in alchemical distilling.

name: goblin market
desc: Sell your bounty to a magic market in the wild.

name: fine crucible
desc: Resiliant vessel for melting substances.

name: cooking pot
desc: A standard cooking pot.
flavor: Boil 'em, mash 'em, stick 'em in a stew.

name: cauldron
desc: Like a cooking pot, but larger.
flavor: Fire burn and cauldron bubble.

desc: Add a cellar to your domicile.

name: expanded cellars
desc: Increase the size of your existing cellars.

name: better Organization
desc: With better ways to place things to save on space in your cellars.

name: siege perilous
desc: The fabled seat of destiny.

name: runecrafter
desc: Hire a dwarf to craft runestones for you.

name: apprentice
desc: Take on an apprentice to do work for you.
flavor: Why does it cost money?

desc: Install a basement beneath your home.

name: oracular insight
desc: You see things before they happen.

name: wizard's hall
desc: Construct a Wizard's Hall.

name: fire werry
desc: A hidden pocket of the plane of ash and fire.

name: water werry
desc: A pocket of the endless sea.

name: earth werry
desc: A space carved from the plane of earth.

name: wind werry
desc: An island floating in an endless sky.

name: cat familiar
desc: Your familiar is a cat, as dark as the night that spawned him.

name: owl familiar
desc: Your familiar is an owl, most active at night, just like you are.

name: kobold familiar
desc: Your familiar is a kobold, greedy for gold.

name: imp familiar
desc: Your familiar is an imp, devious and prone to mischief.

name: tome familiar
desc: Your familiar is an animated tome, filled with arcane knowledge and a thirst for expansion.

name: animate model skeleton
desc: Perpetual, if rudimentary, reanimation of your model skeleton
flavor: Not useful for much, but it's a start. Now what if I...

name: blood gem cache
desc: These things seem... vital. Find room for more.

name: blood gem stash
desc: More. You need more. Secrete them away from prying eyes.

name: blood gem arsenal
desc: Closer. Closer. Somewhere they'll never leave your sight.

name: corporeal reconstruction
desc: You've learned better. Perfected the science. You can recreate yourself perfect and free of mankind's flaws.
flavor: The optic nerve doesn't have to connect like that. The joints are inefficient. Why does that nerve take such a detour? So many baffling errors.

name: herbal remedy
desc: Create a herbal mixture to repair the damage in your body that living as a starving street orphan brought with it.
flavor: The bitter taste serves as better motivator to feed yourself properly than hunger ever could.

name: stony resilience
needtext: Your geomancy level must be higher than the amount of times you bought this upgrade. Gargoyles and grotesques are counted as 1 geomancy levels each for this requirement.
desc: Inspired by your statuary, make your flesh as enduring as granite.

name: ablative barrier
desc: The circle's ward shields you from harm.

name: unquenchable flames
desc: The flame of life within you refuses to go out.

name: hallway of faces
desc: Start collecting strangers' faces as disguises.

name: ghostly pranks
desc: Recruit idle spirits to play pranks on passersby.

name: aerial eavesdropping
desc: Eavesdrop upon the breeze to gather gossip and blackmail.

name: icy games
desc: Teach the spirits of water a game about freezing the villagers' hair and laundry.

name: magical spying
desc: Use your new magics to furtively poke and pry into people's private affairs.

name: harvesting faces
desc: It occurs to you that you could make collecting faces so much quicker and easier.
flavor: It just needs the aid of a knife and a few preservatives.

name: scanning faces
desc: Calibrating your automata's sensors for facial recognition should speed the process.

name: commune
desc: Commune with natural forces.

name: eat children
flavor: How could you!?!

name: Lucid Dreaming
extdesc: Replaces Relax with a superior rest action.
desc: It is within a grand dream that an oneiromancer can do the impossible.
flavor: You almost wish to never wake up again.

name: Enchanted Study
desc: Using your arcane powers, enchant the texts populating your study's shelves to whisper their hidden wisdoms.
flavor: For what good is a wizard without grimoires as magical as himself?

name: Solitary Magic
desc: Some say the study of magic doesn't truly begin until apprenticeship ends. People say a lot of things.

name: Professional Magick
desc: Every province has its handful of runaway apprentices and failed Adepts. It's not uncommon for thieves and rangers to know a spell or two. They are nothing compared to the talents of a true professional.

name: Arcane Ascendant
desc: The masses of arcane dabblers never reach such heights.

name: Magical Mastery
desc: You are a master of your field of magic.

name: Supreme Sorcery
desc: Not even the masters could challenge you.

name: Dhrunic Magic
desc: Magic from a forgotten age.

name: Ageless Magic
desc: Ages of the world come and go; only these endure.

name: bolthole
desc: A portal to a safe place deep underground, for exploration and experiments.

name: backyard
desc: A portal to a safe place far into the wilderness, for relaxation and landscaping.
